summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 4, 5 and 6, Block 1, Bailey's Addition to Georgetown; Lot 21, Block 32, Hill Tract Addition, and Lot 7, Block 1, West Woodland Park Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-60 and 17-37, respectively.
